welcome.title: Learn Languages with Lengofy
welcome.heroDescription: Join a community of language learners who master new languages by playing interactive games together. Challenge friends, track progress, and make learning fun!
welcome.featuresDescription: Experience a new way of language learning that's social, interactive, and actually fun
welcome.feature1Description: Learn together with friends or meet new language partners. Challenge each other and grow together.
welcome.feature2Description: Engage in fun, competitive games designed to reinforce language concepts naturally.
welcome.feature3Description: Monitor your improvement, earn achievements, and compete on leaderboards.
welcome.featuredGameDescription: Master German noun genders through an exciting multiplayer game. Challenge friends to a duel and see who can master der, die, das the fastest!
welcome.communityDescription: Connect with language learners from around the world
welcome.finalCTADescription: Join thousands of learners who are already mastering languages through play.
